text: The Linköping Arena is an association football stadium in the town of Linköping in Sweden. It was opened in 2013 and has a capacity of 8 500 and hosted four games during the UEFA Women's Euro 2013 tournament. The stadium became home to Linköpings FC women's association football team after that tournament. The name was discussed for a while and the project was named the Arena Linköping before the name was changed to Linköping Arena. == References == ==Other websites== *Linköping Arena Category:2013 establishments in Sweden Category:Football stadiums in Sweden Category:Linköping
title: Linköping Arena
